analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x5afc0b82bd845f20804e42ec049bee8e17fa9700.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x5afc0b82bd845f20804e42ec049bee8e17fa9700.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
